attributes.additional_details: Ther is a verry bad out brake off headlice this winter in schools and nurserys i would like to try and bring back the headlice nurse in schools so could you all please sighn the petition to help bring back the nit nurse as headlice can cause salp infection and are effecting the children with other health problems on ther head whitch is causeing pain and iratation whitch must be effecting the education due to the iratarion
